scanner - Static variable in class client.Client

SelectionState - Enum in client
 
SelectionState() - Constructor for enum client.SelectionState
 
selectMode() - Method in class client.DataProcessing
Select mode of the client MODE 1 = TEST MODE (user can sent command manually to the SMTP server) MODE 2 = SEND MODE (user receive guided instructions and commands are automatically generated) QUIT 3 = QUIT PROGRAM
sendData() - Method in class client.DataProcessing
Send DATA Command and content of the mail to the SMTP Server
sendHelo() - Method in class client.DataProcessing
Send HELO Command to the SMTP Server
sendLoop - Variable in class client.ClientHandler
 
sendMailFrom() - Method in class client.DataProcessing
Send MAIL Command to the SMTP Server
sendQuit() - Method in class client.DataProcessing
Send QUIT Command to the SMTP Server
sendRecipient() - Method in class client.DataProcessing
Send RCPT TO Command to the SMTP Server
sendReset() - Method in class client.DataProcessing
Send Reset (RSET) Command to the server

This method will start client
startTestMode() - Method in class client.DataProcessing
